titleStmt.title: A dialogue betvveen a Brovvnist and a schismatick. VVherein is discovered the schismaticks endeavour to bring to confusion the government of church and state in this our kingdom of England.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The "3" on the imprint date is crossed out; "March. 9. 1642".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
